column9: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2021
column14: I discovered this lipstick a few years ago when I tried it for the first time. I was pleased to see that it stayed on for hours! I know lots of lipsticks make that claim, but then I'm disappointed when I find out differently. When I first started buying this lipstick it was only around $3 a tube. So I guess an indication that others like it as much as I do, is the cost rising to more than double with most sellers.

column9: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2016
column14: I've been wearing this color for like 8 yrs!! Up I love it! Not to dark, or to light. Goes on smooth, has a little shine to it. It last a long time. It doesn't make my lips sticky. I love cover girl, & can't beat the price. I've tried the more expensive brands but I always go back to cover girl :) and it goes on a little lighter then it looks

column6: Color was not anything close to the computer color.
column9: Reviewed in the United States on March 15, 2020
column14: I love Covergirl lipstick & had a rose color which I love. Could not find the same # on the tube so I picked something close. It was so off, I would never wear it. But return was very easy. Strangely, I found the exact # I was looking for, the same color I have had a long time, and it somehow just appeared on the screen search (could not find it when looking earlier). That happens sometimes & makes no sense to me when searching on the computer.

column6: Color is completely different than shown
column9: Reviewed in the United States on August 3, 2019
column14: Ordered Covergirl 415 lipstick.  The picture on Amazon for this matched the lipstick I've used for years (pale pink lipstick with black base and clear cover).  What I received was a red base / cover and a red  / dark coral colored lipstick. It says "covergirl" and "415" "delight blush" on the base - not at all what's shown or that I expect after using Covergirl 415 for years.

column9: Reviewed in the United States on February 22, 2022
column14: I was to the bottom of a lipstick and knew I had to get another, but the package label was so worn off I couldn't decipher what the name/# was.  It adds a little bling to any of your pink to raspberry colors. (I like Maybelline 410 Blissful Berry with this on top).

column6: One for my purse and one for home - Happy!
column9: Reviewed in the United States on March 22, 2015
column14: I was so relieved to find it on Amazon. I have used this color for years and want to continue to...only it isn't easy to find in stores, at least I didn't find it so. It arrived with 2 lipsticks of my color - one for home and one for my pursue. I'm all set! I like what I like...and I don't like to have to waste time trying to find things - or waste time finding new things, when the old one was really nice.

column9: Reviewed in the United States on March 9, 2022
column14: This disappointed on two counts:  First, the color was not accurately pictured.  Second, it didn't even last through my dinner.  I do NOT recommend this at all if you are looking for a long-lasting lip color.

column9: Reviewed in the United States on December 1, 2019
column14: Have been using this li[stick for several years and continue to be a fan. Shade is compatible with many wardrobe colors. Unhappy that Cover Girl seems to  have dropped this product from their line.
